title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Family Sundays
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Family Sundays              Family Sundays          Family Sundays return on June 19 and will continue through September 4. Join us between 11:30 a.m. and 2:00 p.m. for 18th and 19th century games and different family-friendly activities each week. These activities include a variety of arts, crafts, and historical explorations related to the site and its occupants. Bring the whole family to learn about the house and history...and have some fun, too!
